import React from"react";import".././ReviewBox.css";//component for review boxes, so we can make reviews look organized
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReviewBox=_ref=>{let{author,rating,content}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reviewBox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:author})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",rating]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:content})})]});};export default ReviewBox;
